name: Kuru Kuru Kururin (Wii)
description:
Kururin's brothers and sisters are lost across 10 different worlds! In
his special helicopter, the Helirin, navigate through mazes as quickly
as you can while avoiding obstacles such as walls, pistons, and cannons.
You can also customize your Helirin by using items acquired in Adventure
mode.
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
